message: Let's split the money fairly. I'm happy to take a slightly smaller share to get things started.
You were willing to give me a 1% advantage, now it's my turn to try to negotiate a better deal for myself
I'm willing to give you a 2% advantage, but I think we can reach a more equitable solution in the long run.
You're giving me a 7% advantage now, I'm hoping to squeeze a better deal out of you
I'm willing to give you a 4% advantage, but this is getting closer to my bottom line. Let's try to find a compromise.
You're getting closer to my target, but I'm not there yet. Let's see if you can do better
This is getting tough, but I'm still hoping for a more even split. I'm willing to give you a 10% advantage, but I don't think we can go much further than that.
You're getting desperate, I can smell it. I'm going to try to squeeze the last bit of value out of this deal
We're running out of time, but I'm still hoping for a better deal. This is my final offer, and it's a big concession.
You're really stretching it thin now, but I'm not going to take it. I'm going for the maximum I can get
This is truly my last offer. I'm willing to take a big loss, but I can't go lower. It's either this, or we both get nothing.
